post.summary: Perform an INTERNATIONAL WIRE outbound transaction. This new version of the endpoint optionally supports Foreign Exchange and non-USD currencies.

parameters.name: Idempotency-Key
parameters.description: For each new Transaction Request, the optional IdempotencyKey should be a unique identifier (UUID). If the same IdempotencyKey is used a second time for the same API, the application will not process a new transaction, but return the response of previous request. IdempotencyKey records have TTL of 24 hours.

post.summary: Perform a DOMESTIC WIRE outbound transaction

parameters.name: Idempotency-Key
parameters.description: For each new Transaction Request, the optional IdempotencyKey should be a unique identifier (UUID). If the same IdempotencyKey is used a second time for the same API, the application will not process a new transaction, but return the response of previous request. IdempotencyKey records have TTL of 24 hours.

Fee amount to be charged. Dollar amount for flat fee and percentage in decimal format for percentage fee

dayOfMonth.description: Day of the month when fee is charged for monthly fee

settlementAccountNumber.description: The account the fee amount will be credited to

feeChargingAccountNumber.description: The account the fee amount will be debited from. This is used when a different account will be used to debit the fee from. Default to accountNumber of the transaction if this is not set

sameDay.description: Flag to define if fee applicable only for SameDay ACH Transactions

updatedAt.description: Timestamp when the payment instrument was last updated

achHoldDays.description: How many days to hold ACH

checkDepositHoldDays.description: How many days to hold check deposit

immediateOrigin.description: The ABA number of the bank that is originating the ACH transactions

immediateDestination.description: The ABA number of the bank that is receiving the ACH transactions

immediateDestinationName.description: The name of the bank that is receiving the ACH transactions

timezone.description: The timezone in which the ACH transactions are to be processed

windows.description: The extraction windows for the ACH transactions

serviceType.description: The service type for the ACH transactions

leadDays.description: The number of business days to wait before processing the ACH transactions

offsetAccountNumber.description: The offset account number for the ACH transactions

offsetRoutingNumber.description: The offset account routing number for the ACH transactions

offsetAccountName.description: The offset account name for the ACH transactions

offsetType.description: The offset type for the ACH transactions

offsetAccountType.description: The offset account type for the ACH transactions

quickExtract.description: Extracts are performed at 1 minute intervals, regardless of extract windows. (UNUSED - will be removed)

checkForDuplicates.description: Should the ACH transactions be checked for duplicates (UNUSED - will be removed - use product setting instead)

allowOverride.description: Should allow override of the effective entry date (UNUSED - will be removed)

warehouse.description: Should allow warehousing of the ACH transactions (UNUSED - will be removed)

strictReturnCheck.description: Strict return check for the ACH transactions

complexBatchOption.description: Behavior when an Outbound file contains batches that should not be processed concurrently due to account overlaps.

NachaExtractionWindow.description: The extraction windows for the ACH transactions

NachaProductCalendar.description: The calendar for the ACH transactions

productId.description: The productId is used to set a fee that applies to every account belongs to the product

accountNumber.description: The accountNumber is used to set a fee on an account

settlementAccountNumber.description: The account the fee amount will be credited to

tranType.description: The transaction type that will incur the fee

dayOfMonth.description: Day of month when fee is charged

feeChargingAccountNumber.description: The account the fee amount will be debited from. This is used when a different account will be use to debit the fee from. Default to accountNumber if not set.

sameDay.description: Only required when setting ACH fees

programId.description: The programId is used to set a fee that applies to every transaction belongs to the product that belongs to the program.

sameDay.description: Indicates if Transaction is Same Day

gatewayRoutingNumber.description: Required only if used for IAT ACH transaction

accountNumber.description: Braid account number if the counterparty has an account on Braid

individualId.description: The individualId the counterparty is associated with. If set, the counterparty can not be used with other customers. One and only one of the association (accountNumber / businessId / individualId / productId) is required.

businessId.description: The businessId the counterparty is associated with. If set, the counterparty can not be used with other customers. One and only one of the association (accountNumber / businessId / individualId / productId) is required.

productId.description: The productId the counterparty is associated with. If set, the counterparty can be used with any account with the productId. One and only one of the association (accountNumber / businessId / individualId / productId) is required.

accountNumber.description: The accountNumber the counterparty is associated with. If set, the counterparty can not be used with other account numbers. One and only one of the association (accountNumber / businessId / individualId / productId) is required.

debitCurrency.description: Currency of the local account used for the wire. Currently must always be USD.

debitAmount.description: Amount in the debit currency. Only one of creditAmount or debitAmount is supported.

fxQuoteId.description: This represents an FX quote that has already been obtained for the specified currency. If this is not given, a new quote will automatically be obtained.

fundsOnHold.description: The amount of credits that have posted but the funds are not available for use yet

fraud_ring_detected.description: Indicates if a fraud ring was detected

bot_detected.description: Indicates if a bot was detected

image_url.description: The URL of the selfie image

video_url.description: The URL of the selfie video

Capture.description: The capture details of the selfie

street2.description: The second line of the street address

customer_id.description: The unique identifier for the customer

id.description: The unique identifier for the verification

created_at.description: The timestamp when the verification was created

completed_at.description: The timestamp when the verification was completed

shareable_url.description: The shareable URL for the verification

redacted_at.description: The timestamp when the verification was redacted

summary.description: The summary of the date of birth verification

DateOfBirth.description: The date of birth verification summary

ip_proxy_type.description: The type of IP proxy detected

ip_spam_list_count.description: The count of spam lists for the IP

ip_timezone_offset.description: The timezone offset for the IP

redacted_at.description: The timestamp when the document was redacted

is_deliverable.description: Indicates if the email is deliverable

breach_count.description: The breach count for the email

domain_is_free_provider.description: Indicates if the domain is a free provider

domain_is_custom.description: Indicates if the domain is custom

domain_is_disposable.description: Indicates if the domain is disposable

top_level_domain_is_suspicious.description: Indicates if the top-level domain is suspicious

linked_services.description: The linked services for the email

items.description: The linked services for the email

street.description: The street address extracted from the document

city.description: The city extracted from the document

region.description: The region extracted from the document

postal_code.description: The postal code extracted from the document

country.description: The country extracted from the document

ExtractedAddress.description: The address extracted from the document

id_number.description: The ID number extracted from the document

expiration_date.description: The expiration date of the document

issuing_country.description: The issuing country of the document

issuing_region.description: The issuing region of the document

date_of_birth.description: The date of birth extracted from the document

ExtractedData.description: The extracted data from the document

summary.description: The summary of the ID number verification

synthetic_identity_score.description: The score for synthetic identity abuse

stolen_identity_score.description: The score for stolen identity abuse

original_front.description: The URL of the original front image

original_back.description: The URL of the original back image

cropped_front.description: The URL of the cropped front image

cropped_back.description: The URL of the cropped back image

face.description: The URL of the face image

Images.description: The images related to the document

summary.description: The summary of the address verification

po_box.description: Indicates if the address is a PO Box

status.description: The status of the KYC check

summary.description: The summary of the name verification

linked_services.description: The linked services for the phone

items.description: The linked services for the phone

summary.description: The summary of the phone number verification

status.description: The status of the risk check
The status of the selfie check

accept_tos.description: The status of accepting terms of service

Steps.description: The steps taken during the verification process

Template.description: The template used for the verification

text.description: Text with detail about the event

text.example: ach origination status changed to PENDING
ach origination status changed to PENDING

returnReason.example: Representative payee deceased or unable to continue in that capacity

text.example: ach origination status changed to POSTED

text.description: Text with detail about the event

text.example: ach origination status changed to REJECTED_VELOCITY_EXCEPTION

fileName.description: Unique filename generated by the server.

processingDate.description: Timestamp when the file was loaded.

originalFileName.description: Filename provided by the user that loaded the file.

requesterIpAddress.description: IP address of the user that loaded the file

originalCount.description: Total number of detail entries in the entire file.

originalCreditCount.description: Total number of CREDIT detail entries in the entire file.

originalDebitCount.description: Toal number of DEBIT detail entries in the entire file.

originalCorrectionCount.description: Total number of Notification of Change entries in the file.

originalReturnsCount.description: Total number of Return entries in the entire file.

originalDishonorCount.description: Total number of Dishonored Return entries in the entire file.

pendingTransactionsCount.description: Number of transactions were successful and are now PENDING

offsetTransactionsCount.description: Number of transactions that were skipped because this system does not process offsets.

postedTransactionsCount.description: Number of transactions were successful and are now POSTED

rejectedTransactionsCount.description: Number of transactions are now in any REJECTED status

manualReviewTransactionsCount.description: Number of transactions that require manual review

duplicateTransactionsCount.description: Number of transactions that were skipped because they were already loaded in another file

successfulReturnsCount.description: Number of inbound Return entries that successfully matched a previous transaction

notificationOfChangeCount.description: Number of inbound Notification of Change entries that successfully matched a previous transaction

returnsDishonered.description: Number of attempted inbound returns that failed and need to be dishonored.

fileErrors.description: Array of detailed file and batch level errors.

errorTransactions.description: Array of detailed transaction level errors.

rejectedTransactions.description: Array of transactions that are in any REJECTED status

totalTransactions.description: The total number of transactions created from this file. Can be less than number of entries in the file.

totalErrorCount.description: Count of error messages logged while processing the file, including file, batch, and detail entry level errors.

fileErrorCount.description: Number or file and batch level errors, same as the size of the fileErrors array

originalCountOk.description: A boolean flag indicating that the 'original' totals all add up

fileError.description: True if this file errored out before transactions could be created.

errorTransactionsCount.description: Number of transactions that generated errors while processing.

FileProcessingStatusTransaction.description: Array of transactions that are in any REJECTED status

text.description: Text with detail of the payload

text.example: your account is created and account number is 123456789

message.example: your account is created and account number is 123456789

text.description: Text of the disclosure, only allowed when TYPE is not PDF
text.example: This is a sample disclosure text

action.description: Action to be performed on the disclosure

enableIpRestriction.description: Should the IP restriction be enabled for this developer

ipAddress.description: IP Address to be white listed

tenantId.description: Tenant ID for which the ip address is to be whitelisted

DataSeerReportRequest.description: Request parameters for generating historical DataSeer files

individualId.description: The individualId the counterparty is associated with. If set, the counterparty can not be used with other customers. One and only one of the association (accountNumber / businessId / individualId / productId) is required.

businessId.description: The businessId the counterparty is associated with. If set, the counterparty can not be used with other customers. One and only one of the association (accountNumber / businessId / individualId / productId) is required.

productId.description: The productId the counterparty is associated with. If set, the counterparty can be used with any account with the productId. One and only one of the association (accountNumber / businessId / individualId / productId) is required.

accountNumber.description: The accountNumber the counterparty is associated with. If set, the counterparty can not be used with other account numbers. One and only one of the association (accountNumber / businessId / individualId / productId) is required.

dateOfBirth.description: Date of birth of the counterparty

productId.description: The productId the counterparty is associated with

accountId.description: The accountId the counterparty is associated with

businessId.description: The businessId the counterparty is associated with

individualId.description: The individualId the counterparty is associated with

alertIds.description: Alers Ids to be added to the case

items.description: Alers Ids to be added to the case

mobilePhone.description: Mobile phone number of the business

achCompanyId.description: Optional ID to be used as Company Identification in the Nacha file. Default as EIN if not set.

achCompanyName.description: Optional Name to be used as Company Name in the Nacha file. Default as Business name if not set.

externalId.description: Assign an external reference to the customer

routingNumber.description: The routing number of the bank

accountNumber.description: The account number of the bank

bankAccountType.description: The type of the bank account

rdfiNumberQualifier.description: Required only if used for IAT ACH transaction

gatewayRoutingNumber.description: Required only if used for IAT ACH transaction

date.description: effective entry date - YYMMDD format, or one of: today, todayPlus1, todayPlus2

direction.description: credit or debit of the transactions

amountChange.description: amount to add to the base amount on each new transaction

filename.description: Filename of the ACH settlement file

sentAt.description: When the file was approved/sent to the bank

comments.description: Comments related to the settlement file
comments.example: This is a comment about the settlement file.

fundingAccountNumber.description: Funds will be transferred real time from this account to cover the transaction in case of insufficient fund. Must be a valid accountNumber if present.

presetAccountNumber.description: Preferred number to use for the account, instead of auto-generated

sweepAccountNumber.description: Account balance will be swept to this account number in a daily basis. Must be a valid accountNumber if present.

ofacId.description: The Id of the OFAC result that needs to be whitelisted

isWire.description: Flag indicating whether it's a Wire or ACH exception

notes.description: Description of the reason for status change

dateOfBirth.description: Date of birth of the customer

enableIpRestriction.description: Should the IP restriction be enabled for this developer

mobilePhoneVerified.description: Date when mobile phone number was verified

emailVerified.description: Date when email address was verified

fundingAccountNumber.description: Funds will be transferred real time from this account to cover the transaction in case of insufficient fund. Must be a valid accountNumber if present.

sweepAccountNumber.description: Account balance will be swept to this account number in a daily basis. Must be a valid accountNumber if present.

canAcceptSweep.description: TRUE if the account can be the recipient of daily balance sweep from other accounts

status.description: The processing status of the file

tenantId.description: The tenant ID of the file

transactionCount.description: The number of transactions in the file

transactionAmount.description: Total amount of transactions in the file

transactionErrorCount.description: The number of error transactions in the file

drawdownsCount.description: The number of drawdowns in the file

invalidStatusTransactions.description: List of invalid status transaction paymentIds

items.description: List of invalid status transaction paymentIds

invalidAmountTransactions.description: List of invalid amount transaction paymentIds

items.description: List of invalid amount transaction paymentIds

productId.description: Product id associated with the statement

programId.description: Program id associated with the statement

accountName.description: Account name associated with the statement

ordinal.description: Default sort order of the transaction type

friendlyName.description: Friendly Name of this transaction type

balanceCheckRequired.description: Does this type require the account to have a sufficient available balance?

duplicateCheckSupported.description: Can transactions of this type be flagged as duplicates?

velocityRuleSupported.description: Can transactions of this type be rejected or flagged for rules violations?

entryIndex.description: Index (starting from 0) of the request entry that failed.

BatchError.description: Errors that occurred while processing this batch.

originalCount.description: Number of entries in the original request.

processedCount.description: Number of transactions that have been created from this batch.

ipAddress.description: IP address of the user that created this batch.

username.description: Name of the user that created this batch.

email.description: Email of the user that created this batch.

errors.description: Errors that occurred while processing this batch.

errorCount.description: Count of the errors that occurred while processing this batch.

totalCount.description: Total of all records that were handled, including transactions and errors. Should equal originalCount when the batch is complete.

processingTimeSeconds.description: Time (in seconds) from batch creation to most recent transaction created.

transactionsPerSecond.description: Calculated average number of transactions per second.

processingSuccessPercent.description: Calculated percentage of request entries that created a transaction.

existsOnLedger.description: Did we find this account on the ledger

activeOnLedger.description: Is this account active on the ledger

deletedOnLedger.description: Is this account deleted on the ledger
